text: How do I manage a Python based daemon on Linux?
I have a working Python based program that I want to run as a daemon.
Currently I'm doing it in a very hackish manner of starting it in with screen-d -m name session and killing it with pkill -9 -f name.
Eventually I'm doing to have to move this to the better system we use here (thus I'm not willing to modify the program) but in the interim, I'm looking for a cleaner way to do this.
